_comment: OPTIONAL CONFIG: Enable PreToolUse for audio on permission prompts
_warning: This config is NOISY! Audio plays before EVERY tool execution.
_usage: Copy this to user_preferences.json if you want audio before commands

enabled_hooks._comment_notification: Plays when Claude sends system notifications (NOT permission prompts!)
enabled_hooks._comment_stop: Plays when Claude finishes responding - RECOMMENDED
enabled_hooks._comment_pretooluse: ⚠️ ENABLED - Plays BEFORE every tool (including git commit) - CAN BE NOISY!
enabled_hooks._comment_posttooluse: Plays after each tool execution (VERY noisy) - Keep disabled
enabled_hooks._comment_userpromptsubmit: Plays when you submit a prompt - OPTIONAL
enabled_hooks._comment_subagent_stop: Plays when subagent tasks complete - RECOMMENDED
enabled_hooks._comment_precompact: Plays before conversation history compaction - OPTIONAL
enabled_hooks._comment_session_start: Plays when Claude Code session starts - OPTIONAL
enabled_hooks._comment_session_end: Plays when Claude Code session ends - OPTIONAL

playback_settings._comment_queue: Enable audio queue to prevent overlapping sounds
playback_settings._comment_max_queue: Maximum number of audio notifications in queue
playback_settings._comment_debounce: Minimum milliseconds between same notification type

_usage_notes: ⚠️ THIS CONFIG ENABLES PRETOOLUSE HOOK - IT WILL BE NOISY!
With pretooluse enabled, you will hear audio:
• Before every Read, Write, Edit, Bash command
• Before git commit (this is what you wanted!)
This means A LOT of audio notifications!
1. If you want audio on permission prompts: cp user_preferences_with_pretooluse.json user_preferences.json
2. If it's too noisy: revert to user_preferences.json (without pretooluse)
Just accept that Notification hook doesn't fire on permission prompts,
and rely on Stop hook for task completion notifications (less noisy, cleaner UX)
